Welcome to our team page!

Our Team

We are a dedicated team of students passionate about bringing accurate and timely weather information to your fingertips. Our diverse backgrounds and unique skills come together to create a seamless and user-friendly experience for you.

Our Mission

Our mission is to provide an intuitive and reliable weather forecast platform that caters to your needs. Whether you're planning your week or your month, our goal is to ensure you have the latest weather updates and forecasts at your disposal.

Our Vision

We envision a world where everyone can access real-time weather information effortlessly. By leveraging advanced technology and user-friendly design, we aim to be your go-to source for weather updates.
